action-handler.description: Opens a browse dialog listing applicable Java types. Activates if the property is a reference value property from JavaTypeName to JavaType.
Opens a browse dialog listing applicable Java packages of the current project. Activates if the property is a value property and of type JavaPackageName.
Opens the specified Java type using Eclipse Java Editor. Activates if the property is a reference value property from JavaTypeName to JavaType.

action-handler.label: create class
action-handler.description: Creates the specified Java type and opens the created type using Eclipse Java Editor. Activates if the property is a reference value property from JavaTypeName to JavaType, has a @JavaTypeConstraint and specifies CLASS or ABSTRACT_CLASS among type kinds.
